title: Bound in Blood
description: Two girls. Centuries apart. Will either one survive the curse?In the witching hours, Isabella Lynne and Thomas Ludington secretly rendezvous while the rest of the villagers hide behind locked doors in fear of the unknown. With his promise to protect her, Isabella's unease vanishes despite the paranoia-fueled hunting parties destroying innocentsâ€”like her.That was 400 years ago.Now, a secret still remains as Sarah Perkins searches for a life she's been denied while discovering truths that were to remain buried in the past. Everyone is hiding something, including the Wiccans, the townies, and even her quasi-boyfriend. Can a centuries-old secret be something to kill for?
author: Erin    Butler
